actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 8 (2d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Intoxicating Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Fey Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The satyr is resistant to the charmed and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The satyr has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.
